title: Steelers-Dolphins MNF Preview, Prediction (Football 10/28)
description:
Will Brinson and Jared Dubin preview Monday night's Steelers-Dolphins matchup (2:00), including how Pittsburgh should approach the game offensively (3:30) and what Miami would have to do to stand a chance (8:00) before issuing player props and picks for the game (11:00).

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by Jared Dubin to discuss Steelers-Dolphins and if Pittsburgh can make a playoff push.
